resources.string:
Created by: Adam K
Email: adam@everythingandroid.net
Blog: http://www.everythingandroid.net

SMS Popup provides a convenient popup dialog when a message is received that allows you to quickly read and reply to messages. It also provides in-depth customization of message notifications including contact specific sound, vibrate and LED settings.

Feel free to email me any comments, suggestions or bugs.

Credits to Min Tran for the app icon.
(http://min.frexy.com)
